Class VidStreamMgr

java.lang.Object
us.mn.state.dot.tms.client.camera.VidStreamMgr
Direct Known Subclasses:
VidStreamMgrGst, VidStreamMgrMJPEG
public abstract class VidStreamMgr extends Object
Parent class for objects that manage a video stream. Child classes: StreamMgrGst StreamMgrMJPG
Author:
John L. Stanley - SRF Consulting

    • VidStreamMgr

      protected VidStreamMgr(VidPanel vp, VidStreamReq vr)
      Parent stream-manager constructor This should only be called by StreamMgr child constructors (StreamMgrMJPEG or StreamMgrGst).
      Parameters:
      vp - Video panel used to display stream
      vr - Stream request used to define stream

    • setErrorMsg

      protected void setErrorMsg(Exception ex, String defaultMsg)
      Set a stream error message from an exception. (Latches first reported error.) Uses the defaultMsg if the exception has no message.

    • getErrorMsg

      public String getErrorMsg()
      Get the current error message. If none, returns an empty string.
